1.content: First off, who are you?
1.title: Gender

choices: Use the stars to navigate back
Stay there until you can find help
Take your chances and take a dive
Just steer a random direction and hope for the best
11.content: You got permission from your parents to sail alone in the ocean for a few days. When it was time to return, at night, you found yourself lost in the middle of the sea. It would take at least two days to find your way back. What's worse, the boat is surrounded by all manner of large sea animals that you couldn't risk swimming with. What do you try to do?
11.title: Boy

112.content: You decide to stay in the boat until you can get assistance. Then you notice a large darke shape in the water below you. You see it is a
112.title: A whale

choices: knocks you out of the boat
1122.content: The humpback is directly below you. Then it swims up and
1122.title: Humpback whale

11221.content: It opens its mouth and you are engulfed inside. You wait for the whale to swallow
11221.title: in the mouth

112211.content: You land in the stomach which is still filled with fish. You wait for a while, thinking of your family.
112211.title: it swallows

113.content: You can't take it anymore and so you contemplate what to do. Then, you decide to take your chances and swim home. You pack up your suitcase, change into swim trunks and scuba gear, and jump overboard with your case. Suddenly, a huge creature leaped out from under you, mouth wide open. What animal is it?
113.title: Take your chances and take a dive

11311.content:
When you dived down you find a large school of fish swimming around, as you start to swim away from them a bubble-jet shoots up in front of you. When you look back all of the fish had packed themselves in tightly together in a sign of danger.
You see clearly that the bubble-jet had completely surrounded you and the fish. You look down out of fear of what you might see coming up.
When you make out that it was at least 5 whales, 'thinking of a documentary you had seen once.'
http://www.bing.com/videos/search?q=hump...
The whales heading towards the surface mouths wide open, as all you could do was watch as hundreds of fish are flushed down the whales throat. The whales reaching the surface mouths starting to close. The force of the whales surfacing has sent you flying through the air and unfortunately for you straight into the mouth of a whale that had just surfaced, thrown into its mouth, shortly after the whale closed its mouth completely and proceeded to swallow the entire contents in a single *GULP...
... landing inside the whales stomach surrounded by hundreds of fish flopping around on the stomach floor. When a hard stink hit your nose, the smell of burnt fish and you realised that the whale had started to digest. Slowly the liquid built up eventually reaching you as it only started as a tingling feeling the liquid started to burn through your foot causing you to fall in face first as you let out one final scream of searing pain, as you to become nothing more than part of the mushy build up.
11311.title: Humpback

11321.content:
Under the water's surface you are confronting by a shark, you're still not sure waht kind it is but it's circling you and then disappears. You think to yourself "Phew. That was to close." After thinking that you see that same shark again and realize that its a great white, and its coming straight at you. You attempt to swim out of the way and you look back to see it open its mouthas wide as it can you see rows upon rows of razor sharp teeth, you look ahead and you realize your on the menu today. As the slide into the sharks mouth just missing the teeth. Now inside the shark's mouth you begin to panic.
The shark then swallows you alive and you're deposted inside its monstrous side stomach. And think to yourself "This is how I'm going to die, no-one will ever find my body.
11321.title: Great White

11323.content: A whale shark was happily cruising along, looking for something to feed on, when it notices you. It swims underneath you and sucks you into its now wide maw as you land in the water.
11323.title: Whale Shark

113231.content:
Your weren't a strong enough swimmer to escape the whale sharks open maw, as it closes around you, darkness envelopes you. And you fall into the waiting stomach, you start to scream, but then realise there is no point no-one will ever know what happened to you, you will have just disappeared.
Meanwhile the stomach begins to churn and digest and you are slowly disolved into nothing but a nutriont enriched soup for the shark to absorb later.
113231.title: You are trapped

113232.content: You are just able to escape the maw before it closes, and you swim on with your suitcase. Then, something finds you.
113232.title: You escape

choices: One of them bounces you away
1132321.content: You find a dolphin as it finds you, and its has feelings for both hunger and play. It swims around you playfully and tries to get you to follow. You are amused by it and proceed to approach it. Another dolphin appears, both pretty large compared to your size and decide to play with you. One pushes you out and into the air with its beak, and they continue to play catch with you until...
1132321.title: Dolphin

11323211.content:
As one of the dolphins tosses you in the air the other prepares to catch you. Not the way you hoped. You find yourself descending into the gaping maw of the dolphin below you. Screaming, you fall past the teeth and onto the slimy tongue. The dolphin lets out a series of clicks to welcome you as it closes its beak, sealing you in darkness. The tongue greedily manoeuvres you around, sucking at your taste before flicking you into the gullet.

***GULP***

Like so many hapless fish, you are sent on your final trip down a dolphin's oesophagus and into its belly where you are slowly digested. Alive.
11323211.title: Little Fishy

1132322.content: You continue to swim along when your scuba tank gets tangled in a jellyfish's tentacle. You try and get it off, but you find that the jellyfish has tangled in your whole body. Its stingers are not that powerful, but the creature's overall size along with the tentacles ensures that you don't escape. You are close to passing out when the creature brings you into its mouth, stuffing you into its single organ - the stomach.
1132322.title: Jellyfish

choices: a Blue whale coming up to the surface for air
that same Whale shark from earlier
11323222.content: which creature devours the jellyfish as well as your self...?
11323222.title: A creature eats the jellyfish

113232221.content:
After swallowing you whole the jellyfish continues to search for more food, when on the inside of the clear membrane you could see a large shadow directly beneath the jellyfish and coming closer and high speed.
When you make it that it was a whale surfacing. On the way up it notices the jellyfish floating along, when it opens its abyss of a mouth out all the way, seeing straight down the whales gullet thinking, 'is this better or worse...'
When the whale comes its mouth enveloping the jellyfish with ease as it surfaces you get one last glimpse of light as the whale shut its mouth, sealing you in darkness. As the whales head started to tilt as everything that the whale had picked up with you and the jellyfish were falling towards an enormous gullet, nothing putting up any resistance towards escaping the inevitable.
The jellyfish that had eaten you already was now slowly sliding towards the dark pit of the whales gullet, as you start to panic, pounding against the walls of the jellyfishes stomach. As all you had done was loosened the grip of the jellyfish as it falls down into the pit below. Shortly after with a near deafening *GULP... the jellyfish and everything else landed in the whales cavernous stomach.
Not long after arrival the whale had started to digest, everything around you was now slowly dissolving into a large pool of thick liquid with pulp, shortly after it had started the jellyfish you were inside had dissolved completely...
... the only thought in your mind was, 'why isn't it affecting me...?' not that you were unhappy about not being digested, you were worried as to how long you would be inside this behemoth.
113232221.title: a Blue whale coming up to the surface for air

113311.content:
Your world suddenly goes dark as a giant beak emerges from under you and shuts with a snap. A hungry bottlenose dolphin had seen you vulnerable in the water and decided to help itself to an exotic snack. It unceremoniously tosses you around its mouth, sucking on your flavour and teasing you with its tongue. You fight back, but you are no match against the dolphin's strength to whom your futile struggle was merely a game. As if you hadn't been tortured enough, the dolphin parts its jaws slightly to let in enough light for you to see. Keeping a firm hold on you, it manoeuvres you to face it's throat. Then, ever so slightly releasing the pressure, you begin to slide towards the back of its maw. You beg for mercy and flail around trying to grab on to something, but the dolphin rolls its tongue into a funnel shape, speeding up your slide. There is nothing you can do except watch in horror as the jiggling uvula beckons you towards the point of no return.

The gullet is the last thing you see.




With little effort the bottlenose dolphin exaggerates a wet gulp. A couple joyful clicks expresses the dolphin's satisfaction as it feels you squirm down its throat. It was enjoying every bit of your suffering, knowing fully well the fate that awaited you in its slimy gut. Content with its snack the dolphin gracefully dives into the water and swims away, with you wriggling in its belly, never to be seen again.
113311.title: Playing With Food

113312.content: A huge orca leaps out from under you and takes you in its open mouth, which closes, trapping your feet outside. You fit comfortably inside its mouth, while its soft tongue comforts you as you get terrified of your position. It swallowed your suitcase already, giving you an insight on how you might end up. Right now, it just tastes your body all over, somehow loving it too much to swallow. What happens next?
113312.title: Orca

1133121.content: The orca takes your feet in and tastes them all over while your head is pressed to the entrance of its throat. It then slowly swallows you whole. You are overtaken by the rippling throat as you are squeezed down into a large sac that is its stomach. Then, is burps out your swim trunks and swims on. You press on the stomach walls and try to find a way out, but that just makes it even happier. You then just wait for something to happen.
1133121.title: It swallows you

11331212.content: all of a sudden you feel yourself being pushed up towards the mouth with fish and everything in the stomach then the mouth opens too show a small cave where the orca lives then you see the whale look at you but not as food but as something else but what
11331212.title: It regurgitates you

11332.content: A large octopus takes you in its tentacles, strangling you and ensuring no escape with suction cups on them. You get scared and try and struggle, but it simply opens its beak and engulfs your upper body, slurping in the rest, unable to taste your succulent body as it deposits you in a simple stomach sac. You try and cut your way free, but the sac is too strong to break, and so you think to yourself, "I guess I'll never get home..."
11332.title: Octopus Snack

choices: A giant sea monster is nearby?
115.content: You look around on your boat wondering what to do, and you start to feel hot, uncomfortable. Because of this, you totally undress and stand there on the boat, now completely nude. Your slim, white, eleven-year-old body is now cooling off in the air. Just then, a decent size wave hits your boat, knocking your clothes and scuba gear into the sea. Great you think to yourself, I am alone, lost, and now completely naked on a boat, could this day get any worse?
115.title: More

choices: The kraken thinks you look tasty!
The kraken finds you uninteresting and replaces you on your boat!
1152.content:
Another wave rocks your boat, and you crouch low as you glance around, trying to see what's causing these waves. You start to wish you hadn't, as an enormous tentacle erupts from the water off the starboard side. You stare in shock--it's bigger than it has any right to be. As you stare, you feel more waves rock the boat and turn all around to see more tentacles rising, surrounding your boat and sending off waves. You hang on to the side for dear life, terrified at what's going on.

Then, one of the tentacles moves towards your boat, and you stumble back away from it as it flops down heavily on top of the boat. You watch as it quickly coils around, wrapping around the whole boat, going underwater, and looping around to the top again. Your boat is small, but it's still surprising to see this tentacle coil all around it. You stare at the appendage. It must be at least a foot wide... And this is it's thinnest point, as it gets thicker farther away from the tip! While you stare at the tentacle, another tentacle moves in and wraps around the other side of the boat. You look back and forth at them, scared. This tentacled beast has a good grip on your boat, and that means you are in big trouble.

Suddenly, the boat is lifted off the water. You fall over, but get up quickly as the boat is lifted up by the two tentacles. You can't help but peer over the edge, seeing that you're about a dozen feet above the water. Then, to your horror, and enormous eye with a golden iris opens from underwater, glaring at you. The eye rises, and the whole body of the massive tentacled monster surfaces.

You gaze at it. It's a massive squid, the size of the myical kraken. The creature is floating like a boat, its body lying on the surface to expose half of its body and both eyes so it can look at its catch. Meanwhile, the many other tentacles rise up on the opposite side of your boat... And you don't notice as one approaches you.

The foot-wide appendage reaches you and deftly wraps around you, suction cups sticking to your bare torso as it wraps around you from chest to waist. You stare in shock at first, but then begin to scream and struggle, pounding the tentacle with your free fists. The giant squid doesn't care, though, and easily plucks you off the boat, bringing you under its hull and around to its eye. It holds you parallel to the water's surface, right in front of the enormous eye, far bigger than your head, and you stare at it as if hypnotized. You would be panicking now, but the eye looks quite beautiful...

Really, this whole creature has a certain impressive beauty to it, with it's huge scale and its skill with its tentacles. It is strong enough to lift a boat but gentle enough to snatch and manipulate a human without hurting him. Still, you'd enjoy it more if you weren't being coiled up by its enormous tentacles and held inches from its giant eye.

The kraken continues to stare at you, its eyes revealing no emotions. You don't struggle anymore, knowing that your life is in is giant monster's hands--or rather, tentacles. And so you remain coiled up in its grasp, awaiting its decision of what to do with you...
1152.title: The Kraken

info.brief_description: You are alone on a sailboat surrounded by hungry sea animals
info.description:
You are alone on a sailboat sailing the ocean. You end up too alone and want to get out, but your boat is surrounded by hungry sea creatures. Will you escape?

Rules:
Oral vore only
No blood or gore
No digestion - either end story or make animal spit out
Larger than normal animals are a big plus
